scripts.compress-extensions: rm vscode-extensions.tar.zst && cd out/ && tar cf - extensions | zstd -10 -T0 -o ../vscode-extensions.tar.zst
scripts.decompress-extensions: rm -rf out/extensions && mkdir out/extensions && cd out/ && zstd -d -T0 -c ../vscode-extensions.tar.zst | tar xf - -C .
scripts.copy: yarn clean && mkdir out && cp -R ../vscode/extensions-bundle/ ./out/ && yarn rimraf out/draft
